screen1Text: Strengthen your in-game strategy with Valaron Lineups! Save your favorite lineups and share them with friends. Ready? Let's get started!
screen2Text: Discover quick and effective lineups during the game. Save your favorite strategies and have them always at your fingertips. Get ready to surprise your opponents!
screen3Text: Share your strategies and chat with other players. Exchange ideas in our common chat area and make new friends. Together we are strong!
